snippet.title: SNES Longplay [317] Makeruna! Makendou 2: Kimero Youkai Souri
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Valis77

This is the sequel to Kendo Rage (Makeruna! Makendou). This time you play as where Hikari, (Josephine) Mai's younger sister, who enters the Monster Presidential Tournament. There are references in this game that are easy to spot and i have to say it's pretty funny and enjoyable at the same time. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
